attributes.action: Ensure the Crystal Palace RC track is retained as part of the park regeneration
attributes.additional_details:
We need to ensure a small area of the park is retained for the track.
The area is approximately 60m x 40m is a simple tarmac area that is enclosed by fencing.
attributes.background:
As part of the regeneration the track has not been included in the plans.
Can you help the members of this 40 year old club ensure the developers add the track into the plans for the park to be used by the local community as has been for many years.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about this track and related developments are a matter for the owners and relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
